author: Football Italia staff
title: Coronavirus cases continue to fall
description: Another 578 people have died in Italy over the last 24 hours after contracting COVID-19, but the number of new cases and intensive care admissions continue to fall.  	In the daily press conference, it was confirmed the death toll is now 21,645.
content:
Another 578 people have died in Italy over the last 24 hours after contracting COVID-19, but the number of new cases and intensive care admissions continue to fall.
In the daily press conference, it was confirmed the death toll is now 21,645.
